description:
A light hearted comedy based on the about the daily life of a "normal" Japanese family. The Tachibana family consists of a housewife mom, a salary-man dad, and teenager Mikan and Yuzuhiko.
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
Mom wants to teach the children the power of ‘I can’ thinking... Mom shows the family their true ultimate secret weapon. Yuzu is dying to see himself in sunglasses, but the World has other plans...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Haha "Tsuyoki de!" / Suzu, Sunglasses Kaketai / Haha, Shinheiki ga Suki
Strong-Willed Mom! / Yuzu Wants to Wear Sunglasses / Mom Likes New Weapons
母「強気で!」 / ユズ, サングラスかけたい / 母, 新兵器が好き

REGULAR.description:
Who knew that multi-tasking could be this hard?! It’s been ten years and the memories have piled up—both good and bad. Even the most lenient husbands have their limits...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mikan Is Reset to Factory Settings / We`ve Been Here for a While / Dad Is Very Tolerant
Mikan, Shokika Sareru / Kono Machi mo Nagai wa ne / Chichi wa Utsuu ga Ookii
みかん, 初期化される / この町も長いわね / 父は器が大きい

REGULAR.description:
Yuzu’s fanclub tries to imagine the wondrous woman who raised their idol... Mom and her friends put their money where their mouth is... When your mother’s intensity is at complete odds with the subject at hand...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yuzupi no Okaa-sama / Haha-tachi no Bowling / Haha no Kenmaku ni Youchuui
Yuzupi`s Mother / Mothers` Bowling / Beware Mom`s Angry Glare
ユズピのお母さま / 母たちのボーリング / 母のケンマクに要注意

REGULAR.description:
Yuzupi’s fan club has a new charm to get his attention... Tricks to look younger, or just looking younger? Mom is getting tired of her irresponsible family and she’s got a new plan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kawashima, Omajinai / Mizushima-san, Wakai / Jibun no Oshiri wa Jibun de ne
Kawashima`s Charm / Mizushima-san Is Young / Take Care of Your Own Butt!
川島, おまじない / 水島さん, 若い / 自分のお尻は自分でね

REGULAR.description:
Every mom will have her day. Everyone’s got that one friend... When you hold your tongue you hold the peace.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Haha, Saeteru Hi / Yuzu-tachi, Eiga ni Iku / Otoko-tachi no Heiwa
Mom`s on the Ball / Yuzu and Friends Go to the Movies / Men`s Peace
母, さえてる日 / ユズたち, 映画に行く / 男たちの平和

REGULAR.description:
Mom gets sucked in by the jigsaw demon. When you and your teacher both call people by the wrong name. Don’t mess with Mom’s food.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Haha to Jigsaw Puzzle / Mikan, Yobimachigai / Kantan Arange Ryouri
Mom and the Jigsaw Puzzle / Mikan Confuses / Simple Meals
母とジグソーパズル / みかん, 呼びまちがい / 簡単アレンジ料理

REGULAR.description:
Mom`s got a shiny forehead to match her shiny personality... Did the room just get brighter? Is Mom good enough to become the world champion refiller the world needs and deserves? Nowadays, everybody avoids being direct so as not to be blunt. However, Dad and his friend think that that`s not always the best...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Odeko, Pikkaa / Haha, Tsumekae no Tensai / Otoko-tachi no Rokotsu
Shiny Forehead / Mom, the Refill Genius / Man`s Bluntness
おでこ, ピッカー / 母, 詰め替えの天才 / 男たちのロコツ

REGULAR.description:
The fine tradition of daughters pulling out gray hairs. 
Yuzu wants to know the big secret.
What attracts us to someone isn`t always easy to explain...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pull Out That Gray Hair / Yuzu Is Bad at Not Being Independent / What Does Dad See in Mom?
Shiraga o Nuite / Yuzu wa Amae Heta / Chichi wa Haha no Doko ga?
白髪を抜いて / ユズは甘え下手 / 父は母のどこが?

REGULAR.description:
Mom`s version of the hip bath is scary...
Whoever thought Mikan would be envious of Yoshioka.
Families can be so cruel...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Haha, Hanshin`yoku / Yoshioka Urayama! / Haha no Kaifuku Hou
Mom, in the Hip Bath / Yoshioka Envy! / Mom`s Rejuvenation Methods
母, 半身浴 / 吉岡うらやま! / 母の回復法

REGULAR.description:
Fujino just wants a girl to think he`s funny...
It`s the holey experience...
What are you into these days?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sudou-chan no Megane / Donuts Boom / Saikin Kyoumi Aru Koto
Sudou-chan`s Glasses / Donut Fever / What I`m Into Lately
須藤ちゃんのメガネ / ドーナツブーム / 最近キョウミあること

REGULAR.description:
Mom awakens the window cleaning pro in Mikan, but Mom`s greed ends Mikan`s cleaning career prematurely.
Mom draws on the hive intelligence to make crucial decisions too often.
Mom just can`t get the hang of coming up with appropriate examples for her excitement.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mikan, Madofuki Shokunin / Haha, Mushi Komi / Haha, Tatoe Heta
Mikan, the Window-Cleaning Pro / Mom`s Hunch Intelligence / Mom`s Not Good at Examples
みかん, 窓ふき職人 / 母, 虫コミ / 母, たとえ下手

REGULAR.description:
Will Mikan ever meet her Christmas miracle again? Mom teaches Mikan how technology dampens your intuition. The most boring Christmas ever is about to take	a drastic turn for Mikan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Beary Christmas / Prehistoric Mom Swears on Her Intuition / Iwaki-kun and the Christmas Cake
Bear Ken no Christmas / Haha, Kan de Ikiru Genshijin / Iwaki-kun to Christmas Cake
ベア研のクリスマス / 母, カンで生きる原始人 / 岩木くんとクリスマスケーキ

REGULAR.description:
The family has their own special brand of New Year`s traditions... Knowledge is powerful, but for mochi pounding, that`s not all you need... So many hopes, so much to do, so little time...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: New Year`s at the Tachibana House / The Mochi Competition / New Year`s Is Too Short
Tachibana-ke no Ganjitsu / Gochounai Mochitsuki Taikai / Mijikasugiru Oshougatsu
タチバナ家の元日 / ご町内もちつき大会 / 短過ぎるお正月

REGULAR.description:
Dad just does dad things when his whim strikes... The brain training actually works, but maybe it shouldn`t have? Boys really have a one-track mind....
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dad Doesn`t Consult / Mom`s Brain Training / Ugh, Boys
Soudan Shinai Chichi / Haha, Nou Tore / Danshitte, Yaane
相談しない父 / 母, 脳トレ / 男子って, やーね

REGULAR.description:
No, she`s thinking about important things!
Nasuo`s embarrassed by his mom`s bento lunch at first, but then...
The line between creepy and not is not always clear...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Haha, Ikken Boutto Shiteru / Nasuo no Chara Ben / Korette Non-Kimo?
Mom Spaces Out / Nasuo`s Character Bentos / Is This No-Creepo?
母, 一見ぼーっとしてる / ナスオのチャラ弁 / これってノンキモ?

REGULAR.description:
Good intuition and good timing don`t always go hand in hand.
When it all goes according to plan.
Mom`s not going to let the small businesses down.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Haha, Hen ni Kan ga Ii / Otoko-tachi no Omou Tsubo / Ganbare Beam
Mom Is Strangely Intuitive / According to Men`s Plan / You-Can-Do-It Beam
母, へんに勘がいい / 男たちの思うツボ / 頑張れビーム

REGULAR.description:
Yuzu is very careful to not crush Takkun`s euphoria for demons.
For Mikan, too many times, asking is silver, silence is gold.
The guinea fowl is so good that it leads to a downward spiral of silliness.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Takkun no Setsubun / Mikan wa Yabo / Horohoro Toriwake Jiken
Takkun`s Bean Throwing Festival / Mikan`s a Boor / The Guineafowl Incident
たっくんの節分 / みかんはヤボ / ホロホロとりわけ事件

REGULAR.description:
Sometimes, school exams stress the parents more than the kids.
Is Mom`s little girl growing up?
The best snacks are had in the dead of night.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Haha-tachi, Jukensei no Oya / Mikan no Valentine / Yuzu, Shin`ya no Otoko Meshi
Mothers, Parents to the Entrance Exam Students / Mikan`s Valentine / Yuzu`s Late-Night Men`s Meal
母たち, 受験生の親 / みかんのバレンタイン / ユズ, 深夜の男飯

REGULAR.description:
Why doesn`t Mikan want to help around the house?
Only Mikan`s noticing the little things.
Let the meaty torture begin!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mikan Doesn`t Want to Help / Nothing Beats Dad`s Kindness / I Want Hamburg Steaks
Mikan Tetsudaitakunai / Chichi no Yasashisa Otoroeru Koto Nashi / Hamburg Tabetai
みかん手伝いたくない / 父の優しさ衰えることなし / ハンバーグ食べたい

REGULAR.description:
Takkun only eats what Yuzuhiko eats. 
Hiking is so relaxing. Oh wait, Mom`s along... 
Were Mikan and Yuzu switched at birth?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Takkun the Big Eater / Mom, Dad, Trekking / Mikan Drops the Balls
Yoku Taberu Takkun / Chichi, Haha, Trekking / Mikan, Tama Wasureru
よく食べるたっくん / 父, 母, トレッキング / みかん, 玉忘れる

REGULAR.description:
Finding the perfect setting for returning umbrellas is harder than it seems.
Mikan just really wants to know why you just laughed.
Yuzu falls into a hateful parallel universe.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kasa no Smart na Kaeshi Kata / Ima Nande Waratta no / Yuzu, Ankoku Sekai
The Smart Way of Returning an Umbrella / Why Did You Just Laugh? / Yuzu and the Shadow Realm
傘のスマートな返し方 / いまなんで笑ったの / ユズ, 暗黒世界

REGULAR.description:
Mom and Dad can communicate telepathically. Or can they? Yuzuhiko discovers the intoxicating world of doodling. The day he takes an umbrella is the day he stops being himself.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chichi o Sassaru Haha / Usagi no Rakugaki / Kasa o Mochitakunai Yoshioka
Mom Understands Dad / Rabbit Doodles / Yoshioka Doesn`t Want to Take an Umbrella
父を察する母 / うさぎの落書き / 傘を持ちたくない吉岡

REGULAR.description:
Like mother, like daughter.
Do mothers really know best?	
They might be making a mountain of a molehill.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: They`ll Never Notice / Mom Pretends She Knows / The Yuzu-Fandom`s Hallowed Ground
Zettai Kigatsukanai / Haha, Shittakaburi / Yuzu Fan no Seichi
絶対気がつかない / 母, 知ったかぶり / ユズファンの聖地

REGULAR.description:
Mom`s on a mission for the perfect birthday present.
Yuzu`s school has a phantom baseball club.
The Phantom Club has two die-hard fans.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Haha no Surprise Present / Yuzuhiko, Yakyuubu (Zenpen) / Yuzuhiko, Yakyuubu (Kouhen)
Mom`s Surprise Present / Yuzuhiko and the Baseball Club (Part One) / Yuzuhiko and the Baseball Club (Part Two)

REGULAR.description:
Trying to hold on to `your` slippers is harder than it seems.
With friends like these, who needs enemies?
When mom gives you weird nicknames, you just have to go with it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Onsen Slipper / Yoshioka, Sakana Kirai / Yuzu no Yobikata
The Hot Spring Slippers / Yoshioka Hates Fish / Yuzu`s Nicknames
温泉スリッパ / 吉岡, 魚きらい / ユズの呼びかた

REGULAR.description:
Mom is a tyrannical ruler in the house who can`t be argued with. Or can`t she be?
Mikan and her friends try to see what all that fuss about this event is about.
Everybody has a dream that gets them excited, even dad.
Source: crunchyroll

This House Is My Castle! / Mikan and the Cherry Blossom Viewing / Everybody`s Dream
この家は, わたしの城! / みかん, お花見 / みんなの夢
